description: Adaptive task decomposition learning data - tracks decomposition effectiveness and learned patterns

rootTask.description: Build comprehensive OAuth2 authentication with social login support

subtasks.title: User authentication system - Database schema and migrations
subtasks.description: Create users table with OAuth fields, sessions, and refresh tokens

subtasks.title: User authentication system - OAuth2 provider integration
subtasks.description: Integrate with Google, GitHub, and Microsoft OAuth providers
dependencies: User authentication system - Database schema and migrations

subtasks.title: User authentication system - Session management
subtasks.description: Implement JWT tokens, refresh logic, and session validation
dependencies: User authentication system - OAuth2 provider integration

subtasks.title: User authentication system - Frontend login UI
subtasks.description: Create login page with social provider buttons and error handling

metadata.rationale: Selected technical-layer strategy based on backend-focused task

rootTask.description: Allow members to view and edit their profile information

subtasks.title: Member profile management - View profile page
subtasks.description: Display member information in read-only mode

subtasks.title: Member profile management - Edit functionality
subtasks.description: Add edit mode with form validation and save
dependencies: Member profile management - View profile page

subtasks.title: Member profile management - Avatar upload
subtasks.description: Support avatar image upload with preview and crop
dependencies: Member profile management - View profile page

metadata.rationale: Selected user-journey strategy for user-facing story

issuesEncountered: Avatar cropping library selection took extra time

rootTask.description: Integrate Stripe for subscription billing and one-time payments

subtasks.title: Payment processing system - Minimum viable implementation
subtasks.description: Basic Stripe integration for one-time payments

subtasks.title: Payment processing system - Subscription management
subtasks.description: Add recurring subscription support with plan management
dependencies: Payment processing system - Minimum viable implementation

subtasks.title: Payment processing system - Payment history and invoices
subtasks.description: Display payment history and generate invoices
dependencies: Payment processing system - Minimum viable implementation

subtasks.title: Payment processing system - Webhook handling
subtasks.description: Handle Stripe webhooks for payment status updates
dependencies: Payment processing system - Minimum viable implementation

subtasks.title: Payment processing system - Testing and QA
subtasks.description: Test payment flows with Stripe test mode
dependencies: Payment processing system - Minimum viable implementation

metadata.rationale: Selected incremental-value strategy to deliver payment capability early

anti_patterns.mitigation: Use depth 2-3 for tasks with complexity < 30

anti_patterns.description: Creating too many sequential dependencies in parallel-capable work
anti_patterns.mitigation: Identify truly independent subtasks and minimize dependency chains

anti_patterns.description: Insufficient test coverage planning in decomposition
anti_patterns.mitigation: Always include explicit testing subtask for complexity > 40

anti_patterns.description: Ignoring external API dependencies in estimation
anti_patterns.mitigation: Add uncertainty buffer for tasks with external dependencies

learning_insights.insight: Technical-layer strategy works best for backend-heavy tasks (complexity 60-80)
User-journey strategy performs well for frontend tasks (complexity 40-60)
Incremental-value strategy reduces risk for high-complexity integration tasks
learning_insights.supporting_data: 85% effectiveness despite high complexity and external dependencies

learning_insights.insight: Optimal depth correlates with complexity: depth â‰ˆ ceiling(complexity / 20)
learning_insights.supporting_data: Matches observed pattern across all complexity ranges

learning_insights.insight: Tasks with external dependencies need explicit testing subtasks
learning_insights.supporting_data: All successful high-complexity decompositions included testing
